Sentencas: An innovative hybrid power generation system involving a structure-solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and a proton-exchange membrane fuel cell (PEMFC) is established.
Titulo: Performance of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)/Proton-Exchange Membrane Fuel Cell (PEMFC) Hybrid System

Sentencas: A high-temperature SOFC is not only used to produce electricity, but also supplies the reformed gas to a PEMFC to generate extra electricity simultaneously.
Titulo: Performance of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)/Proton-Exchange Membrane Fuel Cell (PEMFC) Hybrid System

Sentencas: A steady-state thermodynamic model of the SOFC-PEMFC hybrid system is verified based on the mass and energy balance and the electrochemistry theory.
Titulo: Performance of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)/Proton-Exchange Membrane Fuel Cell (PEMFC) Hybrid System

Sentencas: A parametric study is carried out to analyze the effects of various parameters on the performance of the hybrid system.
Titulo: Performance of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)/Proton-Exchange Membrane Fuel Cell (PEMFC) Hybrid System

Sentencas: The SOFC operating temperature and the steam-to-carbon ratio have a positive impact on the power output and overall efficiency of the system.
Titulo: Performance of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)/Proton-Exchange Membrane Fuel Cell (PEMFC) Hybrid System

Sentencas: The operating pressure benefits the system power output but not the overall efficiency.
Titulo: Performance of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)/Proton-Exchange Membrane Fuel Cell (PEMFC) Hybrid System

Sentencas: An optimum SOFC fuel utilization factor exists at the highest value of the power output and overall efficiency of the hybrid system.
Titulo: Performance of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)/Proton-Exchange Membrane Fuel Cell (PEMFC) Hybrid System
